author: Ryan Pickrell
title: Wuhan abruptly increased its coronavirus death toll to 50% higher than previously reported
description: The central Chinese city of Wuhan, where the novel coronavirus first appeared, on Friday revised up its death toll from 2,579 to 3,869 — almost exactly 50%. Local officials in Wuhan said earlier deaths were missed because the city's medical facilities were ov…
content:
The central Chinese city of Wuhan, where the novel coronavirus first appeared, revised its death toll sharply up on Friday.
Local authorities changed the previous figure of 2,579 to 3,869, Reuters reported, citing a reporter from the state-run broadcaster CC… [+2538 chars]
